text: <@U22PJPGK0> what time was the fix rolled out? i've had problems with JS caching this morning, from 7:30 - 11:30. I had to move my scripts out of the footer of the page and into the <head> section b4 any code that I'd changed showed up. Even then, the (old) presence of the JS in the footer cached for about 20 mins so I had the same scripts duplicated for a while

what's also odd is that I created a clone of the JS (before I moved it into <head>) and referenced that, published the template, but it still referenced v1 and not v2. It doesn't seem like the caching that's been mentioned is specific to css but to templates and scripts also
Hey Neil, would you mind linking some examples.

Hi William. Well what dyou know..

I've just re-implemented by scripts exactly the same way that I had this morning but when I update my scripts file now they show up straight away.

Is it possible that the cache-fix rollout was caching???
:laughing: :cookie: hard to say what was going, please reach out if you see any more weirdness
Is anybody having odd goings ons in the Content Staging area? I'm having all kinds of issues! Settings page is blank, templates not updating, unable to update my page.
I was having the settings page blank issue. seems to be working again now
I just chatted with a HS support agent. They are aware of the issue and are working to resolve it.
Has anyone ever had any luck with the get all engaments API Call?
Looking to get a full list of all engagements
The sales platform only shows the past 20
